blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: The first Year
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Rc3UES

by Fandomgirl445, Hikari_Tatsu_TheElementalistWolf

So how does the first year of their new lives are under-way.

What’s gonna happen, how’s all of them handling the fact they can’t do adult things like they’re used to?

This story is co-written with Hikari_Tatsu_TheElementalist_Wolf

This story also runs off Promps from readers as well as random ideas from the writers Feel free to offer them down below.

Words: 198, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of A regressed life.

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, Gen, M/M, Multi, Other
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Nick Fury, Clint Barton, Scott Lang, Phil Coulson, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Peter Parker
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Scott Lang/Sam Wilson, Clint Barton/Phil Coulson/Nick Fury
  • Additional Tags: Diapers, potty training, bottles, Baby!Tony, Toddler!Bruce, child!natasha, Uncle!Sam, Uncle!Scott, daddy!Phil, Mom!Phil, Daddy!Nick, pull-ups, Baby!Peter, Spanking, time outs, School!, Fluff, Like a tone of fluff, Jesus thats a lot of fluff, Angst, a lil angst. no panic, only at the disco, MamaHen!Bucky, Daddy!Steve


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Rc3UES

blog.name: cyberdelph
blog.title: Delph's World
blog.description:
I love reading...I like quotes and girly stuff...

Fan of the Cut & Run Serie & MM romance. 

Also a Black Dagger Brotherhood addict and a THIRDs nerds.

My favorite TV shows are : The Vampire Diaries, Teen Wolf, Buffy the vampire Slayer, Beauty & the Beast, Nikita, Bitten, Sherlock, Almost Human,Veronica Mars, The Following, Flash,iZombie,Supernatural, Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D, MCU...

Sometimes NSFW, so be warned...

Multifandom blog - Hate free blog. 
Multi shipper - Ship all the ships...No drama zone.

blog.name: slut-for-pjosupernaturalmarvel
blog.title: Slut-for-PjoSupernaturalMarvel
blog.description: whats up, my name is Emma, and im just a random girl who likes puns, Pjo, Supernatural, Marvel, and Vines. And nothing is mine if i dont claim it to be

summary: Original no.2 Ned: *points at MJ* do it for the vine MJ: I ain't gonna do it *points at Peter* do it for the vine Peter: I ain't...
body:
Original no.2

Ned: *points at MJ* do it for the vine

MJ: I ain’t gonna do it *points at Peter* do it for the vine

Peter: I ain’t gonna do it *points at ned* do it for the vine

Ned: I ain’t gonna do it

MJ, Peter, and Ned: *starts twerking*

Tony: *walks in*

Tony: …

Tony: *leaves*

Ned: I ain’t gonna do it

Tony: …

Tony: *leaves*

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: At the End of the Path
title: At the End of the Path
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Argcno

by Niitza

It was so rare for soulmates to find each other that young. If God had willed it to happen now, then They had to have a reason.

 

These thoughts assailed Winifred Barnes every time Steve fell ill and the doctor told them to ready themselves for the worst - and yet she could never have imagined what trials awaited him and her son.

But then, who could have?

Words: 20679, Chapters: 3/3, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Captain America (Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Winifred Barnes, James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Abraham Erskine, Peggy Carter, Chester Phillips, Tony Stark, Sam Wilson (Marvel)
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark (background)
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Soulmates, Captain America: The Winter Soldier Compliant, Not Avengers: Age of Ultron (Movie) Compliant, Angst, Angst with a (somewhat) Happy Ending, More angst, An Attempt At Reflecting On The Impact Of The Existence Of Soulmates On Society, Platonic Soulmates, Starring: A Crossover Between Genesis And Plato’s Symposium, Religion, social norms, Social Norms: Breaking Them, World War II, Governmentally Sanctioned Human Experimentation, Propaganda vs. The Historical Truth, Heteronormativity, Steve Rogers and the 21st Century, Steve Rogers Needs a Hug, No Soulmarks


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Argcno

summary: Vingadores 4 | Foto do set sugere presença de Resgate
title: Vingadores 4 | Foto do set sugere presença de Resgate
body:
Vingadores 4 | Foto do set sugere presença de Resgate

Nova foto do set de Vingadores 4 sugere a presença de Resgate, identidade que Pepper Potts assume quando veste uma armadura de ferro nas HQs. Confira clicando aqui.

Recentemente, após a publicação de uma imagem estranha pelos diretores Anthony eJoe Russo, anunciando o o término das refilmagens de Vingadores 4 – veja aqui -, Mark Ruffaloalimentou as expectativas por novos detalhes – confira.

Vi…

View On WordPress

blog.name: scavengingforwords
blog.title:
Fandom!
(largely Marvel Fandom)
blog.description: I'm a nerd who gets sucked into tons of fandoms, here is where I will gather my fandom love. Let’s be honest though, at this point this is like 99.99% Marvel and of that percentage 99% of it is Avengers Academy related.

blog.name: marvel-lous-things
blog.title: Nobody's dead if you ignore hard enough
